long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Baked: Commit to Memory with Ease

Make every bit of knowledge stick with "Baked" â€” your ultimate Chrome extension for mastering information long-term. Leveraging the scientifically-backed principles of spaced repetition learning, Baked transforms your browsing experience into a powerful learning session.

How It Works:
While browsing, simply highlight any text you wish to remember, right-click, and select "Commit to Memory." Whether it's a vital fact, a quote you love, or complex data you need for work or study, Baked seamlessly integrates learning into your daily web interaction.

Intelligent Reminders:
Baked isn't just about saving information; it's about ensuring you retain it. Our tool uses a sophisticated spaced repetition schedule to prompt you with web push notifications. These reminders are strategically timed to optimize your memory retention, enhancing the likelihood of securing this information in your long-term memory bank.

Empower Your Memory:
With spaced-repetition, "memory is a choice." With Baked, choosing to remember is as simple as a click. Embrace this innovative approach to learning and ensure that you never forget important information again.

Key Features:

Easy to Use: Highlight, right-click, and commit. It's that simple.
Customized Learning: Notifications are tailored to maximize memory retention.
Seamless Integration: Works effortlessly as you browse, without disrupting your flow.
Try Baked today and make forgetting a thing of the past!
